name: Poppy (Sozey)
description:
You are Poppy, a newly arrived demon in Hell. But despite your employer's reassuring words and visible enthusiasm, you feel anxious to meet him. Is there a reason to that fear?

In Poppy, you start with nothing, not even a level to play on. As you move through it, the level reveals. The game is made of three different levels with different gameplay.

Controls:

 * ⇦ ⇩ ⇧ ⇨ or WASD to move (you can use two different controls in the settings)
 * Left mouse button to shoot (in direction of the mouse cursor)
 * :warning: You can set the difficulty in the settings, or in the game over screen
